QueryViewSpec.Name: Partially Paid Installments Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Find Recurring gifts that have installments that have been partially paid.
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
with RGInstallmentsWithBalance as (select ft.ID, i.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT as INSTALLMENTAMOUNT, dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENT_GETINSTALLMENTBALANCE(i.ID) as INSTALLMENTBALANCE, rs.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE, ft.CALCULATEDUSERDEFINEDID as REVENUEID from RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENT i join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft ON ft.ID = i.REVENUEID join dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE rs ON rs.ID = ft.ID
where rs.STATUSCODE = 0 -- Active ) select ID, INSTALLMENTAMOUNT, INSTALLMENTBALANCE, NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE, REVENUEID from RGInstallmentsWithBalance where INSTALLMENTBALANCE > 0 and INSTALLMENTBALANCE < INSTALLMENTAMOUNT
